Text: Hey, Hobbit.  Thanks for the upload.  I've got a question.  I have a softmodded Wii. Since it uses a pre-formatted external drive, do I need the other software, or can I just drag the ISO directly into the folder?  I don't want to screw up my WII, and so far, I'm not able to register at the forums.  Thanks!
HobbitGamez is the shiz, you guys.  Helped a total noob out, and now I'm rolling smooth.  Thanks, Hobbit!  Your rock, brotha.
